statements: SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_monitoring;
SELECT id, location, customer_behavior FROM foot_traffic_monitoring;
SELECT sensor_id, time_stamp FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, id, location FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE customer_behavior = 'browsing';
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, location, customer_id FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE location = 'Entrance' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) as total_visits FROM foot_traffic_monitoring GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_behavior FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE location LIKE '%Store%' AND customer_behavior IN ('Browsing', 'Purchasing') ORDER BY time_stamp;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) as average_customer_id FROM foot_traffic_monitoring WHERE time_stamp >= '2021-09-01' AND time_stamp <= '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM store_foot_traffic WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM store_foot_traffic WHERE foot_traffic_count > 100;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT store_id, COUNT(DISTINCT sensor_id) AS unique_sensors FROM store_foot_traffic GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type LIKE '%purchase%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM store_foot_traffic WHERE foot_traffic_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT store_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM store_foot_traffic GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT store_id, sensor_id, MAX(foot_traffic_count) AS max_foot_traffic FROM store_foot_traffic GROUP BY store_id, sensor_id;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, COUNT(behavior_type) AS behavior_count FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'window shopping' GROUP BY customer_id, store_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM store_entrances;
SELECT entrance_name, entrance_location FROM store_entrances WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT entrance_id, entrance_timestamp, entrance_name FROM store_entrances ORDER BY entrance_timestamp DESC;
SELECT entrance_id, entrance_name, entrance_location FROM store_entrances WHERE entrance_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'window shopping' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT entrance_id, entrance_name, entrance_location FROM store_entrances ORDER BY entrance_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT customer_id, customer_type, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE store_id = 1 AND behavior_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY sensor_value ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM store_entrances INNER JOIN customer_behavior ON store_entrances.store_id = customer_behavior.store_id
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, sensor_type FROM customer_behavior INNER JOIN sensor_data ON customer_behavior.customer_id = sensor_data.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data
SELECT foot_traffic_count, timestamp FROM foot_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, store_id FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = 1
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY duration_seconds DESC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND duration_seconds > 60
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE store_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS visits FROM foot_traffic_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY visits DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT behavior_type, AVG(duration_seconds) AS avg_duration FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE store_id = 2 GROUP BY behavior_type;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_name FROM store_details WHERE manager_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensor_details ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location_id FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, entry_count, exit_count FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_data WHERE age > 25;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_voltage FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM foot_traffic_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_voltage > 3.5;
SELECT location_name, entry_count, exit_count FROM location_data WHERE entry_count > exit_count;
SELECT timestamp, activity_type FROM activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
